choices.C: FTAG trees in Cisco ACI are used to load balance unicast traffic.

choices.D: FTAG trees in Cisco ACI are used to load balance mutli-destination traffic.
choices.A: FTAG is used in Cisco ACI to add a label to the iVXLAN traffic in the fabric to apply the correct policy.

discussion.content:
D is right. 
The ACI fabric uses Forwarding Tag (FTAG) trees to load balance multi-destination traffic. All multi-destination traffic is forwarded in the form of encapsulated IP multicast traffic within the fabric. The ingress leaf assigns an FTAG to the traffic when forwarding it to the spine.

Selected Answer: D

An engineer is deploying a Cisco ACI fabric and discovers that the traffic to certain endpoints is dropped. The originating bridge domain is configured with hardware proxy.
Which action prevents this problem?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C

"When a VRF is unenforced mode, regardless of any existing contract configuration, Cisco ACI programs an any-to-any permit rule"
